snippet: Nadal was beaten, 7-6 (7), 6-2, by eighth-seeded Stan Wawrinka in the Italian Open quarterfinals on Friday in Rome.
abstract: Stan Wawrinka beats Rafael Nadal in quarterfinals of Italian Open; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Nadal was beaten, 7-6 (7), 6-2, by eighth-seeded Stan Wawrinka in the Italian Open quarterfinals on Friday in Rome.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Suffers Another Loss on Clay
headline.print_headline: Nadal Suffers Another Loss on Clay
